channel.title: Domains on Aggregated Thinking
channel.description: Recent content in Domains on Aggregated Thinking

item.title: IP-hijacking and then some
item.description: Almost a month of downtime. The servers were fine, but our IP addresses were not. Somehow, a system bug from one of the hosting companies caused our plan to include 14 other IP addresses, and we only maintained 6 as far as I am concerned.
